name: market for floor heating from borehole heat pump | heat, brine-water heat pump 10kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/838/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'heat, borehole heat pump', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This product represents heat measured in MJ. The heat is produced with a brine-water heat pump and a borehole heat exchanger for an average one family house. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'heat, borehole heat pump',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  heat, borehole heat pump', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Conditions of operation extrapolated from Switzerland to RER. Operation with UCTE electricity mix.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Based on average SPF2 (Seasonal Performance Factor, including auxiliary energy) of air-water heat pumps installed in year 1998 operating in Switzerland.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography Europe without Switzerland. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
